WorkItem.Description:
I have to put the list validation on one field but when the drop down list options characters exceed to 255 character excel not open properly, it ask "Excel found unreadable content in (file name) do you want to recover the content of this work book?  if you trust the source of this workbook, click yes"
when user clicks yes
file is recovered and validations are get removed.
please suggest what to do to handle this problem......
WorkItem.Summary: Cell Validation failure on exceeding the "setFormula1()" argument length to 255 characters

Comments.Message: is there a solution for this issue
The solution is not to break Excel's 255 character limit
